images.alt_text: AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing a stunning beach scene with clear blue waters, palm trees, and a sunset.

AI-selected These destination images will highlight the beauty of Thailand's beaches, featuring tourists enjoying the sun and engaging in water activities, aligning with the campaign's relaxing and enticing tone.

AI-selected These destination images will highlight the beauty of Thailand's beaches, featuring tourists enjoying the sun and engaging in water activities, aligning with the campaign's relaxing and enticing tone.

AI-selected These promotional icons will be used to highlight special offers and deals related to travel to Thailand, enhancing the campaign's promotional aspect.

AI-selected The logo will be placed in the header of the email to reinforce brand identity and trustworthiness.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn
assetRequirements.content_context: A stunning beach scene in Thailand showcasing clear blue waters and palm trees, evoking feelings of relaxation and adventure.

assetRequirements.purpose: highlight the beauty of Thailand's beaches
assetRequirements.content_context: Images of popular Thai beaches with tourists enjoying the sun, emphasizing the escape from cold weather.

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Тепло Таиланда этой осенью. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Thailand in autumn, showcasing a stunning beach scene with clear blue waters, palm trees, and a sunset.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
